website_summaries.verdict: Super affordable price point, but with all of the same features as more expensive multipurpose models. Use caution with sharp corners, however.
pros: Non-slip handle fits well in hand
Works exceptionally well as a bench scraper and scoop
Beveled blade edge reduces countertop damage
cons: Blade can bend easily, even with softer products
Ruler gradations may be worn off, hard to see
Not sharp enough for heavy vegetable chopping

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COOKING UTENSIL.
customer_reviews.text: I did not buy this for me, I don't cook! My wife saw something similar on some cooking show, mentioned she would like to have one and being the incredible husband that I am, I bought this. It was the right move! She has raved about ever since, lots of brownie point on this one. She is constantly calling me to the kitchen to show me what she can do with. "Honey look, see how I can do this!" I say "hey thats great", even though I don't have a clue what she's doing. Do yourself a favor guys, if your significant other cooks, get them one of these.
customer_reviews.author: ddkirk

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should, well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great board scraper. It can double as a "chopper", it's not sharp enough that I (personally) would ever call it a knife, but it could definitely do a better job than basic tearing of veggies or something. This is exactly what I was looking for and does the job swimmingly.
customer_reviews.author: clillies92

customer_reviews.title: OK!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I buying one of these that had the little shelf to pick up whatever was cut. This one has a straight flat blade and is not as easy to pick things up. Also the handle is too plump and hard to hold.
customer_reviews.author: picky senior

customer_reviews.title: I would never use this for chopping, so ignore ...
customer_reviews.text: I would never use this for chopping, so ignore that part of the item's description. However, a bench scrapper is the kind of tool you don't appreciate in the kitchen until you own it. Several uses (cleaning up flour, lifting dough, picking up chopped veggies, etc.). This metal version is probably going to scratch your counter if it is a material that can be scratched, so watch out. However, if you use your kitchen there's probably lots of scratches in it! They make a plastic version that I find less worrisome on this front, but the plastic version lacks the flex that the metal version has.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Foster

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Cuts, scrapes, feels steady and comfortable in the hand, built to last a lifetime, what's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Such good quality! It has a little weight to it so it feels good in your hand. Definitely a good kitchen tool for cooking and baking.
customer_reviews.author: mindyg

customer_reviews.title: Strong quality and heat resistant
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally dropped it in my stainless steel skillet while it was ripping hot making smash burgers. Was worried I was going to have to take a break to clean melted plastic out of the pan and toss the patty that was in the pan, but to my surprise the handle didn't melt at all. It's sturdy and apparently also heat resistant!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Get this
customer_reviews.text: A fabulous tool! I use it for so many things that I wonder how I got by without it. Great for cutting through bread dough and scraping a breadboard, but also chops veggies and scoops them up.
customer_reviews.author: Prufreader

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy one these yrs ago? Great for picking up chopped vegetables
customer_reviews.text: I make a lot of soups that have chopped or diced vegetables. This is perfect for transferring to a bowl or pot for cooking. A new favorite tool in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Dog

customer_reviews.title: Most versatile tool
customer_reviews.text: Whether at work or at home, I can't live without at least one scraper in my kitchen. I absolutely love the versatility of a good scraper and this one is awesome. I am a private chef for a fraternity and this is in use every single day at work. It chops, scraps and works great at transferring food from cutting block to pan or pot. I think everybody needs one of these when they are cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Eveline

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not sharp. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Works well on hard veggies (celery, onions, carrots); breaks more than chop/cut. Makes mush of tomatoes. Good for scaping cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Munky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help me make bread but I've found myself using it all the time when cooking! It makes scooping ingredients into a pan super simple and it takes only a second or two. The rubberized grip makes it feel expensive and high-quality despite it only being a few bucks. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Olea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Affordable , easy to handling , cut everything perfect even meats , the best gadget in any kitchen !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my Favorite wedding gifts
customer_reviews.text: This has so many great uses! Our family is bar crazy and they cut even the toughest bars easily. I love the ruler marks on it to keep the bars uniform size. I also use as bench scraper when making bread, use it to gather finely chopped items and move to the pot, etc. Just a really great kitchen tool to have on hand. Highly recommend. I especially like that the edges are straight, unlike many which curve in at the bottom. Can cut all the way to the edge of a pan.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M. Dewall

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cut my homemade caramels and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: THAGONZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chopper for dough
customer_reviews.text: We use this a lot to deal with dough and it works just great. A valued asset in our kitchen.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it was made to do
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to hold and the measurement on the edge is handy
customer_reviews.author: T. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great for scraping cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and scrape the cutting board with. Also handy for measuring dough. Not used to chop with yet
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Can’t work without it.. wish I had ordered a long time ago
customer_reviews.author: SMP

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, easily divides dough, great for shaping, lifting, etc. so glad I bought this
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Wendy S

customer_reviews.title: Get's the job done
customer_reviews.text: I use this every week when I am making things like bread and pasta. It works really well for everything I need it for with that.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina S

customer_reviews.title: Cutting Dough Like a Pro!
customer_reviews.text: This chopper, scrapper, cutter gadget is an indispensable addition to my baking tools. It cuts through dough with surgical precision and clean-up is a breeze. Caution: the edge is sharp! I wish that it came with a blade protector for when it is stowed in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Do you things are amazing, I don’t know how I ever lived without ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing, I don’t know how I ever lived without them. They’ll be in all my Christmas stockings this year.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: That edge tho!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I use it all the time for bread, pastries and desserts as an Exec Pastry Chef over a fine dining + business casual restaurant and catering company. I bought them for my staff and they all love them as well!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Reed

customer_reviews.title: More of a scraper
customer_reviews.text: Good scraper. I don't use it as much as I thought I would but that just may be because I'm a kitchen tool addict :) It's not actually sharp enough to cut herbs, and I don't chop much with it, but it's a great size to scoop up anything you can think of on your chopping board. Very comfortable grip, easy to clean, and good weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mamba

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It cuts, scoops and scrapes. Very handy and my new favorite kitchen tool. Great idea for a cook's Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: iahawk7

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it is good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is the cook of the family. He said it works well for chopping up vegetables and herbs and scooping them in to the pan rather than having to carry a heavy cutting board over to the stove.
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonandBlue

customer_reviews.title: Every kitchen should have one.. It is one ...
customer_reviews.text: Every kitchen should have one.. It is one of those utensils that make you wonder why no one else thought of it..
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great bench scraper.
customer_reviews.text: The grip is great. I use it for creating crisp corners on my cakes. Careful when your washing it, it is sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Schwieger

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Scraper
customer_reviews.text: Nice scraper...one side is beveled to prevent damage to underlying counter. Seems well made and should hold up to a lifetime of use. Ruler is only printed...not etched.
customer_reviews.author: Boss Hog

customer_reviews.title: Very useful.for cleanup.
customer_reviews.text: I had one and bought for a gift. It is a great kitchen tool. Recepient thinks so also. I use to clean up board after cutting and chopping. Have not used for a chopping tool..yet. My real use is clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: wow cool!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is too cool! really. the bottom can chop things like onions and what not with no problem. them scoop thin up easily. the rubber grip is very comfy. I really appreciate the fact that metal is very thick and well made. not at all flimsy. will last forever.! great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Essential tool for baking!
customer_reviews.text: I use this tool constantly as a bench scraper for baking bread and it is terrific, allowing me to handle much higher moisture-content dough without leaving half of it on the work surface. And it is multifunctional, too! Great value. Easy to use; comfortable in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen B.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my kitchen gadgets
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I use it to scoop or scrape veggies or other small things into my pot while cooking. It is sturdy, durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cas Perry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool for any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This chopper is extrememly sharp. Uses include rough chopping herbs but mostly as a scraper to transfer chopped foods into bowls or pans. does a nice job at all. The handle grip is very nice too. Right sized and non slip even with your hands wet.
customer_reviews.author: Garysgal888

customer_reviews.title: Handy Tool
customer_reviews.text: I use this tool on a daily basis. Very handy when making salads, slicing cheese, etc. Just note that hand washing is recommended-my experience has been that dishwasher detergent can cause rusting of the metal blade.
customer_reviews.author: BlottOtto

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My mom had been asking for one of these choppers since she used one of them at church. I liked this version because of the nice grip that it has. She says that it feels really nice in her hands and it has a good weight.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Useful Product
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these years ago but the handle split and broke off, probably from overuse! I had to replace it because I use it constantly. This new one has measurements on the scraper blade, which is a great useful addition. Very useful product.
customer_reviews.author: jml

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! So great for cleaning off the counter with ease after baking!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Once you start using this, if you haven't used one before, you will appreciate all the things you can use this for. I use it in cake decorating, cooking as well as other things.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have a sharp edge so I wouldn't consider it a chopper but it sure works for scraping.

customer_reviews.title: Very User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: This has a nice sharp edge (not sharp enough to cut you) and a comfortable grip. I sue this to scrap pie crust, veggies from the cutting board and semi-soft items (like butter, cream cheese, etc). I do not use it to chop anything.

customer_reviews.title: Good idea!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted at a great price. Fast delivery

customer_reviews.title: Staple in bread making

customer_reviews.title: Great Multi-use chopper
customer_reviews.text: I've used this chopper to chop veggies for omelets, cut dough, and even as a spatula when cooking. The chopper is sturdy and the grip feels natural allowing you to focus on the food. The measurements aren't used often but they are helpful when you want your dough portions to be similar.

customer_reviews.title: this chopper is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: this chopper is easy to use, chops things perfectly. after you are done you can scrap the choppings neatly into the dish you are preparing

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I'm not sure what people are complaining about sharp corners for. While there are, in fact, corners I haven't been hurt by these... yet

customer_reviews.title: Handy kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a chopper and as a scraper! The metal portion is not flimsy - it's sharp enough to cut some raw vegetables as well as dough. The gripped handle and the measuring guide along the bottom has come in handy more than once.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy! Fits in your hand well, Easy to use. Definitely will recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Super chopper/scraper
customer_reviews.text: A great quality chopper/scraper however I experienced a finger cut when I used it the first time due to the razor sharp corner ends. I then took a file and rounded the corners and is working fine now, no more finger cuts.

customer_reviews.title: Good chopping and handle is comfy !

product_meta.title: Norpro Grip-EZ Scraper/Chopper
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackMeasures: 6" x 4" x 1.5" / 15cm x 10cm x 4cm.
A great kitchen tool with a wide variety of uses! Designed to scrape and split bread dough, it can also be used for scraping, crushing, chopping and measuring! With its soft grip santoprene handle and straight-sided rectangular blade, this scraper is the ideal tool to chop and divide cookie dough and pastry dough for rolls and loaves. Also ideal for cinnamon rolls, jelly rolls, brownies, rice crispy treats, dessert bars and more! Measuring guide on the blade allows you to easily measure and cut pasta and pastry dough. Handy for scraping up ingredients to easily transfer to a mixing bowl or for cleaning flour off your work surface. Ideal for chopping vegetables, herbs, garlic, and nuts! Durably constructed with stainless steel blade. Comfortable handle, easy to grip for extra control. 

 Norpro was founded in 1973 with a vision to design, manufacture, and supply the highest caliber kitchenware. Norpro’s offering of innovative, high quality product for cooking, preparing and serving food are produced with superior materials and craftsmanship.
feature_bullets: A great kitchen tool with a wide variety of uses! Designed to scrape and split bread dough, it can also be used for scraping, crushing, chopping and measuring!

With its soft grip santoprene handle and straight-sided rectangular blade, this scraper is the ideal tool to chop and divide cookie dough and pastry dough for rolls and loaves. Also ideal for cinnamon rolls, jelly rolls, brownies, rice crispy treats, dessert bars and more!
Measuring guide on the blade allows you to easily measure and cut pasta and pastry dough.
Handy for scraping up ingredients to easily transfer to a mixing bowl or for cleaning flour off your work surface.
Durably constructed with stainless steel blade. Comfortable handle, easy to grip for extra control.
